Posts.Content: Coming from a family that has been battling breast cancer for several years this really caught my eye. The link below is to a facebook fanpage for a awesome looking charity guitar being built by a recent breast cancer survivor and her brother. The guitar is supposed to be auctioned off sometime next year with all the proceeds going to a charity. Take a quick second and check it out. If you like it, click the like button to show your support... LINK DELETED PER FORUM POSTING POLICIES.
Posts.Title: A BC survivor gives back...
